books.title: The Little Prince
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
books.summary: A young prince from another planet explores the universe, learning about the peculiarities of adult behavior through various adventures.

books.title: Don Quixote
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes
books.summary: The story follows Alonso Quixano who reads so many chivalric romances that he loses his mind and decides to become a knight-errant, roaming in search of adventure.

books.title: Great Expectations
books.author: Charles Dickens
books.summary: The story of young orphan Pip and his growth and personal development towards becoming a gentleman.

books.title: And Then There Were None
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: Ten people, each with something to hide and something to fear, are invited to a isolated mansion on Indian Island by a host who, surprisingly, fails to appear.
